name: Crawling Buster
description:
A little Prototype for a Remake of my first finish game with extra feature.

Used be called "When They Come". Crawling Buster is a Remake of the first Level of the game with some bonus feature.

What In The Prototype?

- 4 Skin of the Player Character

- 4 Type of Weapon

- 2 Type of Enemy (Red bug, Blue bug)

- 1 Boss (Three Eyes Bug)

- 1 Level (The House)

Note: "When They Come" was Never release, since I lost the game file long ago.

Control :

WASD : Movement

Left Mouse : Shoot
